title: Xibei You Mian Cun
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A popular Xibei cuisine chain with many locations. Around 1/2 of the menu is vegetarian and vegan suitable choices ranging from fresh tofu, steamed vegetables with spring water, freshly made bread. Food is made with some organic produce and not oily. English language menu with pictures but no English spoken. The restaurant is located on the 9th floor of the Oriental Shopping Center Address 黄浦区南京东路800号东方商厦9楼(近西藏中路). Name 西贝莜面村
streetAddress: Orient Shopping Centre, Nanjing Road Pedestrian Street 800, 9F
